TopicTitle: Orbiting spacecraft seen from plane at night

Articles.Content: Hi guys, so I was flying my plane when i had something (a satellite) in orbit at 80 km. I believe I saw that satellite from my plane, as a fast moving object. Is this possible in KSP mechanics?

Probably...?

If you think you saw it, it would be a fast moving object

Stock, I don't think so though you may see the little <> or [ ] marker on your HUD.

With Distant Object Enhancement installed, probably.

21 minutes ago, 5thHorseman said:

Stock, I don't think so though you may see the little <> or [ ] marker on your HUD.

With Distant Object Enhancement installed, probably.

I use DOE and yes, it was a fast moving object.
If you hover your mouse over it, it should show what it is, if you have that setting on.
